outsource module¶

Functions called by server’s handlers.

outsource.add_heart_rate(new_HR, patientRecord)¶

Adds new HR measurement and timestamp to appropriate patient record.

Parameters:
  • newHR – Python object of received JSON
  • patientRecord – dictionary of all records to date
Returns:

updated dictionary of all records
outsource.add_new_patient(new_patient_data, patientRecord)¶

Initializes new patient.

Parameters:
  • new_patient_data – Python object of received JSON
  • patientRecord – dictionary of all records to date
Returns:

updated dictionary of all records
outsource.get_average(patient_id, patientRecord)¶

Calculates average HR over all stored HRs.

Parameters:
  • patient_id – patient id as string
  • patientRecord – dictionary of all records to date
Returns:

integer average HR
outsource.get_heart_rates(patient_id, patientRecord)¶

Gets all HRs associated with requested patient id.

Parameters:
  • patient_id – patient id as string
  • patientRecord – dictionary of all records to date
Returns:

dictionary of all HRs associated with requested patient
outsource.get_interval_average(query_interval_average, patientRecord)¶

Calculates average HR since specified time.

Parameters:
  • query_interval_average – Python object of received JSON
  • patientRecord – dictionary of all records to date
Returns:

integer average HR over interval
outsource.get_status(patient_id, patientRecord)¶

Determines whether patient is tachycardic and returns latest timestamp.

Parameters:
  • patient_id – patient id as string
  • patientRecord – dictionary of all records to date
Returns:

dictionary of status and latest timestamp
